name: Facealink
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
facealink cameras are designed to help you look afteryour home and family in a more convenient andsmarter way -even when you're away.

With the facealink Skill and Alexa, you can now accessyour facealink Camera via voice control by simplysaying "Alexa,show me the Camera."

Before you get started, please make sure your facealink device is online and updated to the lates tfirmware.
To get started, select the "Enable Skill' button to link your facealink account and discover your cameras.

After linking your facealink account and discoveringyour facealink cameras in your Alexa account. you canstart controlling your cameras

To look the camera of the front door camera, you can say:
“Alexa, open the front door"
“Alexa, turn on the kitchen lights"

Compatible facealink Cameras:
AJR53PO0804
AJR30PGO705
AJL33PC0801
Firmware version :
YGT.SY-LA3PA1601-V231027.1914
 
Compatible Amazon Alexa Devices:Echo Show
*When using this Skill, you need to specify the nameof the desired camera.
The name is equivalent to the location of where the camera was installed and can be found andconfigured in the facealink app.
You can also add facealink cameras to new or existinggroups in the Alexa app.
